Container.Name: prusa-connect-rtsp
Container.Overview: Capture images from a RTSP camera upload them to Prusa Connect.
Container.Description: Capture images from a RTSP camera upload them to Prusa Connect.

Config.Name: RTSP URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: PRUSA_CONNECT_RTSP_URL URL for the RTSP Connection

Config.Name: Fingerprint
Config.Description: Container Variable: PRUSA_CONNECT_FINGERPRINT Unique ID for the camera. Random UUID is recommended.

Config.Name: Token
Config.Description: Container Variable: PRUSA_CONNECT_TOKEN Prusa Connect Token. Obtain from prusa connect website after creating a camera

Config.Name: Log Level
Config.Description: Container Variable: LOGURU_LEVEL Container Log Level. Recommended: INFO unless debugging then: DEBUG

Config.Name: Upload Interval
Config.Description: Container Variable: PRUSA_CONNECT_UPLOAD_INTERVAL Time between uploads in seconds

Config.Name: Snapshot URL
Config.Description: Container Variable: PRUSA_CONNECT_URL Prusa connect snapshot API url
